segments.text: I see the boy is really determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching as high as he can, standing on his tiptoes on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried for him, he might lose his balance and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, completely trusting her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is still drying dishes, not paying attention to the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should really keep a closer eye on them, they could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is being quite brave, climbing up there like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But it's also quite reckless, he should ask for help instead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what kind of cookies are in that jar, they must be really good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste the sweetness, it's making me crave for some too.
segments.speaker: PAR
